parameters.description: Check interference options as defined by swCheckInterferenceOption_e

title: IModeler.CheckInterference3
description: Checks for interferences among the specified bodies in a part.
signature:
System.Boolean CheckInterference3( 
   System.Object
TargetBodies
,
   System.Object
ToolBodies
,
   System.Int32
Options
,
   out System.Object
Body1InterferedFaceArray
,
   out System.Object
Body2InterferedFaceArray
,
   out System.Object
IntersectedBodyArray
)

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Check interference options as defined by swCheckInterferenceOption_e

parameters.name: Body1InterferedFaceArray
parameters.description: Array of faces that interfered from the first body with the second body

parameters.name: Body2InterferedFaceArray
parameters.description: Array of faces that interfered from the second body with the first body

returns: True if an interference exists, false if not
